HediffDef.label: Cybertech arm
HediffDef.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic arm. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?

HediffDef.label: Cybertech mechanite storage
HediffDef.description: An archotech device in the form of a cybernetic foundry of nanites with storage for them. HediffDef.label: Cybertech bio-reactor
HediffDef.description: An archotech device in the form of a bio-reactor - but it seems to reduce power consumption as well. Significantly more powerful than even glitterworld advanced parts, the esoteric knowledge and skill necessary to produce one is worth nothing without the explicit blessing of an archotech. Perhaps that is the secret to its strength?
